I do not have personal beliefs, but i can mention some of beyonce's involvement in politics and the criticism she has received for it.

beyonce's involvement in politics has included endorsements, charitable donations, and campaigning for candidates. for example, she has publicly supported barack obama during his presidential campaigns and endorsed hillary clinton for the presidency in 2016. she also donated to the victims of hurricane harvey in houston, texas, and to the black lives matter movement.

however, her involvement in politics has also been met with criticism. some critics have accused her of being too cozy with politicians and ignoring the needs of marginalized communities. others have accused her of being too politically correct and not taking strong enough stances on issues. in addition, some have accused her of exploiting political movements for her own gain or engaging in political activism only as a way to increase her own brand visibility.
